Summary: UFO activily brightened while stationary then descended south then ascended
divs: sighting detailsat exactly 5:11 9\12\11 while talking to my girlfriend dallas on the phone, i was talking about how i enjoy looking up at the sky and stars to watch for extra phenomenal activity. right as i said it, what blended in as a star in the northern sky i watched suddenly brighten right when i was saying "i like to look up for extra phenom..." then was distracted by its sudden illumination. it hovered for a moment then suddenly made movement south seeming like it was coming towards me and dropping, it then suddenly ascended upwards at a 50-60 then 75-85 degree angle "with a hue and extracting stream of light behind its path like a tail as it sped up" heading slightly ne it then disappeared out of the atmosphere. the entire event lasted about 30 seconds at most. i have not reported this until now in fear of scrutiny or some form of retaliation. this happened in 2011, while i expected something eventually; it only tied into my theory. but when it happened again, only not quite as brilliant just last week. my girlfriend and i decided to report, provide theories if wanted and investigate. to sum it up, it really happened and i truly believe its our-future and\or from out of this world. in addition i have included a photo of a ufo my nephew witnessed and got pretty shook up by it, i personally interviewed him.
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in Bakersfield
There were no other sightings in Bakersfield on or around September 12th 2011
